CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.4, patientheight (3N)
E2B (R3): D.4 Height (cm) Conformance: Optional Data Type: 3N OID: None Value Allowed: Numeric
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This data element captures the reported height of the patient in centimetres at the time of the event/reaction.
CustomField.label: Patient Height (cm)
